p: Copper(II) sulfate pentahydrate (CuSO 4·5H 2O, 99.995%), oleic acid (OA, tech., 90%), 1-dodecanethiol (DDT, ≥98%), oleylamine (tech., 70%), gallium(III) chloride (GaCl 3, anhydrous, beads), trioctylphosphine (90%), diphenylphosphine (98%), triphenylphosphite (97%), indium(III) acetate (In(Ac) 3, 99.99%), copper(I) iodide (CuI, 98%), anhydrous methanol, anhydrous butanol, and anhydrous toluene were all purchased from Sigma-Aldrich and used as supplied, except for OA and OLAM, which were degassed prior to use.
